languages.text: "Да провалиться мне на месте, нет у него никакого сына... может, раньше и был, но на борт он поднялся без семьи". {n}Абеляр шумно вздыхает.{/n} "Спятил, несчастный..."

traits.locale_text: "Да провалиться мне на месте, нет у него никакого сына... может, и раньше был, но на борт он поднялся без семьи". {n}Абеляр шумно вздыхает.{/n} "Спятил, несчастный..."

languages.text: "I'll be damned if this officer has a son... Perhaps he did once, but he embarked without any family in tow." {n}Abelard sighs heavily.{/n} "He's cracked, the poor wretch..."
languages.original_text: "Да провалиться мне на месте, нет у него никакого сына... может, раньше и был, но на борт он поднялся без семьи". {n}Абеляр шумно вздыхает.{/n} "Спятил, несчастный..."

traits.locale_text: "I'll be damned if this officer has a son... Perhaps he did once, but he embarked without any family in tow." {n}Abelard sighs heavily.{/n} "He's cracked, the poor wretch..."

"I'll be damned if this officer has a son... Perhaps he did once, but he embarked without any family in tow." {n}Abelard sighs heavily.{/n} "He's cracked, the poor wretch..."
"I'll be damned if this officer has a son... Perhaps he did once, but he embarked without any family in tow." {n}Abelard sighs heavily.{/n} "He's cracked, the poor wretch..."

languages.text: 「この士官に息子がいるとは思えない…過去にいたのかもしれないが、家族を連れてこないで乗り込んだはずです」{n}アベラルドは深くため息をついた。{/n}「完全に正気を失ってしまったのでしょう。気の毒に…」
languages.original_text: "I'll be damned if this officer has a son... Perhaps he did once, but he embarked without any family in tow." {n}Abelard sighs heavily.{/n} "He's cracked, the poor wretch..."

traits.locale_text: 「この士官に息子がいるとは思えない…過去にいたのかもしれないが、家族を連れてこないで乗り込んだはずだ」{n}アベラードは深くため息をついた。{/n}「完全に正気を失ってしまったのでしょう。気の毒に…」

languages.text: “如果这个军官有儿子，那我就是活见鬼了……也许他以前有个儿子，但他上船的时候没带任何家人。”{n}阿贝拉德重重地叹了口气。{/n}“他疯了，这个可怜的家伙……”
languages.original_text: "I'll be damned if this officer has a son... Perhaps he did once, but he embarked without any family in tow." {n}Abelard sighs heavily.{/n} "He's cracked, the poor wretch..."

traits.locale_text: “如果这个军官有儿子，那我就是活见鬼了……也许他以前有个儿子，但他上船的时候没带任何家人。”{n}阿贝拉德重重地叹了口气。{/n}“他疯了，这个可怜的家伙……”

languages.text: «No me consta que este oficial tenga hijos... Tal vez los tuviera, pero no los trajo consigo al embarcar». {n}Abelard suspira profundamente.{/n} «El desdichado ha perdido la cabeza...».
languages.original_text: "I'll be damned if this officer has a son... Perhaps he did once, but he embarked without any family in tow." {n}Abelard sighs heavily.{/n} "He's cracked, the poor wretch..."

traits.locale_text: «No me consta que este oficial tenga hijos... Tal vez los tuviera, pero no los trajo consigo al embarcar». {n}Abelard suspira profundamente.{/n} «El desdichado ha perdido la cabeza...».

languages.text: « Cet officier n'a pas de fils, j'en mettrais ma main à couper. Ça a peut-être été le cas un jour, mais il a embarqué sur le vaisseau sans aucune famille. Il a perdu la raison, le pauvre... » {n}conclut Abélard en poussant un long soupir.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I'll be damned if this officer has a son... Perhaps he did once, but he embarked without any family in tow." {n}Abelard sighs heavily.{/n} "He's cracked, the poor wretch..."

traits.locale_text: « Cet officier n'a pas de fils, j'en mettrais ma main à couper. Ça a peut-être été le cas un jour, mais il a embarqué sur le vaisseau sans aucune famille. Il a perdu la raison, le pauvre... » {n}conclut Abélard en poussant un long soupir.{/n}

languages.text: "Ich will verdammt sein, wenn dieser Offizier wirklich einen Sohn hat ... Früher einmal vielleicht, aber diese Reise hat er ohne Familie angetreten." {n}Abelard seufzt tief.{/n} "Der arme Kerl hat den Verstand verloren ..."
languages.original_text: "I'll be damned if this officer has a son... Perhaps he did once, but he embarked without any family in tow." {n}Abelard sighs heavily.{/n} "He's cracked, the poor wretch..."

traits.locale_text: "Ich will verdammt sein, wenn dieser Offizier wirklich einen Sohn hat ... Früher einmal vielleicht, aber diese Reise hat er ohne Familie angetreten." {n}Abelard seufzt tief.{/n} "Der arme Kerl hat den Verstand verloren ..."

languages.text: "Bu subayın bir oğlu olmadığına bahse girerim. Belki bir zamanlar ailesi vardı, gemiye katıldığındaysa yoktu." {n}Abelard derin bir nefes veriyor.{/n} "Zavallı adamcağız delirmiş."
languages.original_text: "I'll be damned if this officer has a son... Perhaps he did once, but he embarked without any family in tow." {n}Abelard sighs heavily.{/n} "He's cracked, the poor wretch..."
